column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Service: I mentioned it was our first anniversary when making the reservation and EVERY employee we ran into said congratulations to us (hostess
column2: 2nd hostess who took us to our table
column6: and yet another hostess on our way out). Our waiter
column8: was fantastic. He provided excellent recommendations on the menu (we were waffling between the truffle mac and cheese and the elote corn at first
column9: and also had questions about the drinks). Our favorite part was that we did not hear him once say "ready to order?" He allowed us to move at our own pace
column10: but was always there to answer questions.
